name: Image-to-Image (Cinema)
description: Transform existing images with AI. Control the strength of transformation with the denoise parameter. Low denoise (0.3-0.5) preserves composition, high denoise (0.7-1.0) reimagines the image. Essential for iterating on concept art, applying film looks, and creating variations.

defaults.negative_prompt: text, watermark, logo, blurry, low quality
